title: Very Good Property to Buy in Pitipana-Homagama
details:
This is a 96P property with a single storied 3 bedroom house built in the year 1999 now available for quick sale.
The location off Moragahahena Road on a 20' wide road access only 5 minutes drive (1.80km) to Pitipana Junction and further 4 minutes drive (1.60km) to Homaga Town.

Full Details of the House :- 1,722sqft floor area, 3 bedroom, hall, dinning area, garage, kitchen(no pantry cupboard), Terrazzo floor, bed rooms fully tiled with wall cabinets. The house wood ceiling (lunumidella) , well water with over head tank ( main line water will be available soon).

Land Extent : 96 Perches

Selling Price : LKR 26 Million(ONO)

NO BROKERS/AGENTS PLEASE
